User Experience Design

Front-End Developement

I have the ability to make my designs a reality in code. My focus has been on static web developement but I’m in the process of learning ios and android developement.

more about me

Design School

I’m in my 4th year at the University of Cincinnati’s  DAAP Program earning a degree in Graphic comunication design. I’m on track to graduation in spring of 2016.

Experience

I over a year of experience working in design in the San Francisco Bay Area.

UX INTERN | SPRING 2014

User experience design work that utilizes behavioral science un order to encourage people to use less energy. The work spanned a variety of different channels including, mobile, web, email and print. Responsibilities included user research, wireframing, prototyping, user testing and documentation

UX INTERN | FALL 2013, SUMMER 2014

User experience design work that utilizes behavioral science un order to encourage people to use less energy. The work spanned a variety of different channels including, mobile, web, email and print. Responsibilities included user research, wireframing, prototyping, user testing and documentation

DESIGN INTERN | SPRING 2013

User experience design work that utilizes behavioral science un order to encourage people to use less energy. The work spanned a variety of different channels including, mobile, web, email and print. Responsibilities included user research, wireframing, prototyping, user testing and documentation

The Energy Industry

In the past 2 years I’ve worked on 3 major projects for companies in the energy industry.

Chevron Corporate Website Redesign

Chevron wanted a new platform to express their human energy brand in the context of story telling. My role was interaction design on a team with visual designers, developers and copy writers.

PGE&E Solar Dashboard

Pacific Gas and Electric wanted a unique online experience so their solar customers could understand their energy bill. I led the design of this project and was responsible for all phases of the design process.

Genability Solar Switch

Switch is a line of web and mobile applications that visualizes a homeowner's potential savings by installing solar panels on their roof. I worked with a small team through all phases of the design process.
